last_episode_to_air.name: There She Goes
last_episode_to_air.overview: Midlife Alex contemplates getting back together with his ex-wife when she visits for Abby's birthday party; young Alex invites his lab partner to a dance to get over his crush on Nori; older Alex tries to keep Eleanor from leaving with her fiance.

name: Me, Myself & I
overview: A comedy examines one man's life over a 50-year span. It explores three distinct periods in his life - as a 14-year-old in 1991, a 40-year-old in present day and a 65-year-old in 2042.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: In 1991, 14-year-old Alex Riley's mom moved them to Los Angeles to marry a pilot. In 2017 40-year-old Alex is an inventor/entrepreneur on top of the world until his wife leaves him and threatens to take their daughter with her. In 2042 at 65, Alex is a highly successful businessman who, after suffering a minor heart attack, decides he’s ready to reinvent himself once again.

episodes.name: The First Step
episodes.overview: Darryl encourages mid-life Alex to get back into the dating scene following his divorce. Young Alex has trouble making friends after his embarrassing moment at the school dance. Older Alex finally has his first date with Eleanor.

episodes.name: The Card
episodes.overview: Young Alex gives away his most prized possession, a signed Michael Jordan rookie card, in an attempt to impress his crush, Nori. Also, mid-life Alex struggles to find the money to take his daughter, Abby, on a glamping trip with her friends, and older Alex tries to make plans for his birthday so he doesn’t have to spend it alone.

episodes.name: Star Wars
episodes.overview: Mid-life Alex is devastated when he learns Ron showed Abby his favourite movie, 'Star Wars.' for the first time, a moment he had been waiting for. Also, in 1991, Young Alex convinces Justin to sneak out of the house to watch 'Star Wars.'

episodes.name: Family Tree
episodes.overview: When Mid-life Alex helps his daughter, Abby, with a family tree project, he's tempted to find his biological father. Also, Young Alex must perform at Ron's family reunion talent show, and Older Alex meets Older Abby's new boyfriend.

episodes.name: New Job
episodes.overview: Mid-life Alex contemplates accepting a new job offer and leaving his partnership with Darryl. Also, Young Alex works with Young Darryl on an invention for his school’s Invention Convention, and Older Alex meets Eleanor’s fiancé, a contractor helping to fix his roof.

episodes.name: Field Trip
episodes.overview: Mid-life Alex becomes friends with another dad at Abby’s school, Ben, without realizing he’s the guy who ruined his marriage. Also, Young Alex competes for Nori’s attention on a field trip, and Older Alex runs into his former business rival, Kelly Frasier.

episodes.name: Home Alone
episodes.overview: Young Alex and Justin panic when they are left home alone for the first time and think someone is breaking in. Mid-life Justin notices Mid-life Alex financially struggling and asks for his help with a business proposition. Older Alex and Justin become emotional when they return home to sell their parents' house.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Darryl and Wendy set up Mid-life Alex on a blind date during Thanksgiving dinner. Young Alex and Justin compete to impress Nori's brother, and Older Alex goes to the diner to see Eleanor on Thanksgiving Day and is surprised when Kelly shows up.

episodes.name: Video Games
episodes.overview: Lisa decides to invest money in Mid-life Alex's new invention, and it begins to affect their dating relationship. Young Alex and Justin secretly open their Christmas presents before the holiday, and they accidentally break it. Older Alex interferes with Abby's career.

episodes.name: Phil Ricozzi
episodes.overview: Mid-life Alex sells one of his inventions to his childhood arch-nemesis, Phil. Also, Young Alex is challenged to a fight by his classmate, Phil, and Older Alex accompanies Eleanor to Phil's funeral and gives an eulogy when no one steps up to speak.

episodes.name: The Breakup
episodes.overview: Darryl asks Mid-life Alex to wait until after Wendy's birthday to break up with Lisa. Also, Young Alex runs for student council president against Nori, and Older Alex gets upset when he finds out Abby quit her job.

episodes.name: There She Goes
episodes.overview: Midlife Alex contemplates getting back together with his ex-wife when she visits for Abby's birthday party; young Alex invites his lab partner to a dance to get over his crush on Nori; older Alex tries to keep Eleanor from leaving with her fiance.
